original_text: Hezekiah did things that the Lord said were good, as his ancestor King David had done. Chronicles 28 Chronicles 30
korean_text: 히스기야가 그의 조상 다윗의 모든 행실과 같이 여호와 보시기에 정직하게 행하여

sentences.original_text: that the Lord said were good
as his ancestor King David had done
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 조상 다윗 왕이 행했던 것처럼
